categories: Category:Star Wars: Episode I Adventures Game Books

nodes.text: Episode I Adventures Game Book 12: The Bongo Rally
Episode I Adventures Game Book 12: The Bongo Rally was the twelfth installment of Star Wars Episode I Adventures game books.

The festival arena outside Otoh Gunga is under attack. An evil pirate and a renegade pair of droids are speeding toward the big Bongo Rally to cause mass destruction. Only one Gungan can stop the villains.
